website_summaries.verdict: This award winner is the brand’s superstar product, offering a very light gel cream to intensely hydrate skin.
pros: The cream contains antioxidant lady’s mantle to wipe out free radicals while diminishing pores and improving the skin’s elasticity
It goes on without feeling “goopy” and is soothing on the skin
Skin feels as if it can "breathe
cons: Despite being billed as suitable for all skin types, a few with oily skin found it caused some breakouts

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin !
customer_reviews.text: My favorite moisturizer hands down. Super light yet extremely hydrating which are really important factors with oily skin like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Kina oddman

customer_reviews.title: The perfect face moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second time buying this now, first time off of Amazon, but my product I received is legit and works so well. It instantly moisturizes all of my dry patches from using retinol, and has hydrated my face so well that no further products will be needed to remedy this situation! So glad I decided to buy this again, as it is one of the only tried and true products that work for my skin other than The Ordinary moisturizer. The price is just a bit high but it will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kamille Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and hydrating.
customer_reviews.text: I got this lotion as a sample in another kit. I loved it so much that I came onto Amazon and found a bigger jar of it. It is so worth the money. It is super light weight, hydrating, makes your skin feel refreshed and perfect after a long day in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Krista Ward

customer_reviews.title: First gel moisturizer I like!
customer_reviews.text: This is just as described. It's a lightweight gel that absorbs quickly and has a very light scent. It doesn't irritate my skin at all, which is unusual. It's great for summer, and not sticky like others I've tried. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: alracybot

customer_reviews.title: Yes, do it
customer_reviews.text: I found out about this product through Ipsy. I LOVE it. I recently started the K beauty routine and I finish with this product and my face has never felt better.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Best for normal to oily skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for 3 years now. If you have a combinational skin then give this product a try. Keeps your skin moisturized for 6+hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite moisturizer. Had already tried the sample ones and really wanted a bigger size, so I decided to get it. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Rayane Alves

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizer for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer, it is great for sensitive skin. I am prone to bad breakouts and this moisturizer is a gel that soaks up into your skin like water. It is light, weightless, and does not leave your skin feeling oily. Also another bonus is it does not burn your eyes, so you can moisturize your eye area without getting irritation. This is a little pricey, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaide Riddall

customer_reviews.title: Hydration your skin needs
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny. It has the right amount of moisture for my oily skin. It leaves the skin with this cooling effect. I feel like my skin thanks me each time a use it. Is a little on the pricey side but a little goes a long way. I estimate this will last me 2 months or more. I’m not getting paid to say this, this is really fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Yissel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lovely, too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my face shiny and a bit weird looking, but so nicely moisturized. It has a light watery clean smell (I can’t describe this). I wish it cost less. Also, I have very sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate it. It feels like putting aloe on, but much more posh. 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Wonkyeye

customer_reviews.title: Holy grail
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many many moisturizers and this has been my holy grail for about 2 years. It’s amazing and the scent is fresh and delicious without being too overbearing. I have crocodile level dry skin and this has been the only thing that has ever given me such great results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this moisturizer after trying a sample size. Feels great, clean smell & my skin likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING hydration for your skin! I use it at night and it leaves my skin smooth and supple all next day! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: AmznCustmr

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Was iffy on purchasing it on Amazon because I was unsure IF it would be the real deal or not but honestly, I couldn’t tell the difference. Worked just like the ones I’ve gotten in the store.
customer_reviews.author: brittni taylor

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: A little pricy but worth the $$. It’s very cooling and dries fast. My skin feels super moisturized after application
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is completely dry and anything else normally would make it worse or create acne. Especially days of using or going days without. I initially got the sample in an iPsey bag and as soon as I ran out I immediately bought it. It very moisturizing, leaves your face feeling smooth and refreshed. It doesn't have a scent wich is perfect. I was thoroughly impressed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Moisture like it should feels great refreshing,my sister shared her with me and decided I can pamper myself also ...
customer_reviews.author: Bonita S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic moisturizer although not "clean beauty"
customer_reviews.text: I think this moisturizer feels nice and does a good job but it has a lot of silicone and non-beneficial ingredients for the skin including some fragrant ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: JC California

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It feels and smells great. Leaves my skin soft and supple.
customer_reviews.author: annette r.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Moisturizing without feeling heavy or irritating
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this product always makes my skin feel so good! Nice texture and smell. It is very moisturizing without feeling heavy at all! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S Young

customer_reviews.title: very good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: very good moisturizer without clogging pores, not greasy. tried numerous moisturizer but this is the best one that i've found. would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: hempseed

customer_reviews.title: It left me a little greasy, but will definitely try it again during the Winter season.
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy applicable, however I noticed that it would leave me a little greasy at the end of the day. I do have naturally oily skin, but I will be trying the product again in the Winter.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaela C.

customer_reviews.title: Ultra hydration
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this one thinking it was the aloe one and when it came I was pleasantly surprised that it worked as well as the aloe moisturizer. I'm very happy with my purchase, my skin has never been so hydrated. I'm a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Good moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a while now. It really gives your face that fresh and moisturized vibrations.
customer_reviews.author: zain

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much! Super hydrating and the scent makes me feel like I just got out of the spa. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Aida Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Glides on like silk.
customer_reviews.text: Luv how this product. When applied it glides on the skin making my skin feel like silk. It does take a minute to absorb into the skin, but luv it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Snseol

customer_reviews.title: not the same
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened with this product. Very different from the one i bought at sephora. Less thick, less moisturizing, leaves my face a little sticky. Original product is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Nemunaitis

customer_reviews.title: Best facial moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Personally I have drier skin and this moisturizer is the BEST! It is not heavily scented, super light weight, and gives my skin a certain glow with this hydration.
customer_reviews.author: Paris

customer_reviews.title: Best Moisturizer I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: I originally tried this product in a promo bag from a make up store. I fell in love right away. I am 53 and was suffering from extremely dry skin and frequent break outs. This stuff is light, sinks in quickly and really hydrates your skin. I use it twice a day and my skin has not looked this good in a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, doesn’t last very long though
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints for the performance of the cream itself. I love it, it feels great on the skin. However, I feel like it would get very expensive to constantly repurchase this. I think there are many other dupes to this one that is more affordable like Neutrogena Hydro Boost, Cerave PM cream, K-beauty brands etc.. so this is more like an every once in a while purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: SuShii

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I only use it at night and and my skin feels soft in the morning, easy to use because is not thick. I would like to try the other products.
customer_reviews.author: Epic

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizes with a fresh scent
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent moisturizer for oily skin. Leaves you face with a clean an fresh scent. You can use it as a primer also. Is very light. I t can be use for matured skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glowing
customer_reviews.text: Got sample from ipsy. LOVED this & ended up buying a huge thing of it. I use it every morning & night & my skin is GLOWING!
customer_reviews.author: G. Spivey

customer_reviews.title: Face like a babies bottom
customer_reviews.text: This is the best post shower skin care on the block. Granted, its the only one beyond your basic lotion that ive ever tried. But this has been a game changer for feeling like my face is an aqua bomb. Highly recommend for wrinkle poofing and long term shielding.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Best moisturizer ever
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best moisturizer I’ve ever used. I had a random sample and was blown away and now buy it in this size religiously. I’ve always had dry skin, and I’ve tried EVERYTHING. Sephora junkie. This stuff is a total game changer and seriously makes my skin look years younger.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Orcutt

customer_reviews.title: This brand is the best I've ever tried and used.
customer_reviews.text: Quenches the skin like no other brand out there. A little will go so far. I will stay with this brand from now on. ❤❤❤
customer_reviews.author: maria smith

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I love this moisturizer. I wish I could afford it year round but I get it for the winter months for sure. It’s amazing. Perfectly moisturizing and no breakouts!
customer_reviews.author: Jillmarieb

customer_reviews.title: Belif is the bom
customer_reviews.text: I have dry sensitive skin. In the winter I need a little extra boost. I use my regular moisturizer at night and add this in at the morning. It is light and does the trick. It smells great and doesn't bother my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Legit feels like I drink a gallon of water a day . My face is so hydrated with this stuff . Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Kenyae

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I get to try lots of skincare from Amazon. This moisturizer is my absolute favorite. This brand is famous for their gel-cream hybrids. It has a unique feel once it is on your skin. It literally feels like creamy, silky water. It's a burst of hydration in a lightweight formula. It works for all akin types and all climates. You don't need much to get the job done, so the container should last for at least two months with twice-per-day use. I can't recommend this product highly enough. It's truly revolutionary. Thanks so much for taking the time to read this review. I hope the information that I've provided makes your decision a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette

customer_reviews.title: Hydrating and Plumping! Clean Fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: This presents in a very, very light green/blue hue; however, it goes on perfectly clear. Moreover, it smells super refreshing: kind of citrus-like with a touch of clean ocean. This really floods your skin with incredible hydration. And, though it takes just a bit to dry down, the results are gorgeous! Really luminous, hydrated, plump skin. Now, the jar is not ideal since it requires that you dip your fingers into it. And, even clean fingers aren't perfect. So, a pump dispenser would be the absolute ideal for this product. Nonetheless, this isn't enough to make me hesitate in buying this outstanding product! I love the entire Belif line ... and this is just one of those classics! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. E

customer_reviews.title: This moisturizer is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is the bomb! The Aqua Bomb, that is. Seriously, it is one of my favorite moisturizers. I have been using it for years. Originally, I got it in a Sephora subscription bag, and was hooked. This time, I ordered it from Amazon. It arrived in perfect condition, and is just like the cream I have been using for years. It moisturizes my skin so well, and leaves it feeling hydrated. I can use it at night, or in the morning before I put my makeup on. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave a greasy residue. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Girl

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Quick-Absorbing
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight "cream" is close to a gel in consistency -- except that you can scoop it with your fingertips. It absorbs quickly and thoroughly. Its non-greasy formula makes it great for the summer when you want to moisturize without the heavier cream that you might need in the winter. My only complaint is that belif does not supply the ingredient list on their product page, and it does contain silicone (trimethicone and dimethicone), an ingredient I try to avoid due to sensitivity. -- Debbie Lee Wesselmann
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Lee Wesselmann

customer_reviews.title: Favourite moisturizer for years!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this moisturizer for 4 years. I used to buy it from a higher end cosmetic store and am so glad to see it on Amazon with all the convenience Amazon offers. It's very might weight, not sticky, and plays well with makeup and works well as a night cream as well. Smells wonderful, very herbal. I have gone through jars and jars of this magical cream. If you have combination skin like I do, give this a try! It actually feels like a drink of water for your skin. Highly highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Super absorbent ! Does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a year now. I live in the tropics and mix this with my Neutrogena hydroboost SPF. I have normal to dry skin. It's super light and absorbs in seconds. No complaints apart from the quantity vs. it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I love how lightweight and moisturizing this cream is. It has a consistency and texture of a gel. Very light and soothing to apply to the skin. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave a greasy or tacky feel. I love how it leaves my skin feeling really soft and hydrated. It also has a very light, clean scent and doesn't linger around, which is nice. Overall, this is bomb! It feels great and works great for me. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Another good product by belif
customer_reviews.text: This company makes really good skin care products and this moisturizer is no exception. It is a gel moisturizer that is thick in the container but goes on smoothly and gently onto the skin. It has a little tacky feeling when first applying, but that goes away as it is absorbed into the skin. Great absorption and gentle on skin. I really like how refreshing it makes my face feel. Can be applied any time of day for a quick boost of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: kcee74

customer_reviews.title: hydration!
customer_reviews.text: These have bit of the gel consistency which is different. I have used more of gel texture skincare products but I always felt like it left a thin flim over my skin. These didn't! I apply right after washing my face in the morning. Wait few minuets and apply my SPF for the day. Doesn't feel heavy and it doesn't have any scent which I love. Only thing I dislike is the jar container. Wish it came with pump!
customer_reviews.author: It works!

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: This is a light gel-cream. It is very moisturizing and takes a while to fully absorb. It reminds me of the sleeping or water masks that I have used which are similar. I only use it at night because it does take a while to absorb. Once it does, my skin is super soft. It doesn't bother my sensitive skin. I don't notice any kind of scent to it. Overall, I like it.
customer_reviews.author: LVesper

customer_reviews.title: belif cream
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and this cream moisturized it well. I also liked that even though this cream was thick, it absorbed surprisingly quickly. I do wish the scent was a little less strong. I also would have it liked it more if the cream was packaged in a more attractive way than the plain cardboard box it came in, but that's my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Alla S.

customer_reviews.title: Good on semi dry normal skin
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer was pretty light weight and I enjoyed the way it felt when I put it on. I tend to use this product when I am not having any issues with my skin. I also use it in the morning before my makeup. I use my heavier creams at night before I go to bed. I think it you had super dry or oily skin that you probably would not want this product, but it seems to work well with my somewhat dry normal skin.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo Moser

customer_reviews.title: Great Moisturizer for Combination Skin!!
customer_reviews.text: I have combo skin -- oily & dry, depending on the season. This moisturizer is amazing! Its very light, non grease and extremely hydrating. I dab a bit onto my face and massage it in every night after cleansing. By morning, my skin feels refreshed and supple. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KlassyLadee04

customer_reviews.title: Good even for oily combo skin
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy, very good moisture but doesn't clog pores or cause more grease and blemishes. I have dry cheeks and between the eyes to forehead too. This was really nice for those areas without caring problems with the other oily/blemish prone areas of my face
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Zar

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best moisturizer. It felt wonderful on the skin, lightweight and made my skin look healthy. My face had a natural glow, the dullness I had disappeared. I received this product in my Allure box and I'm so glad I did. I will be ordering it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheney

customer_reviews.title: great unscented everyday cream
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for drier days when my usual gel-like moisturizer is not enough. It does not irritate my sensitive acne-prone skin. I reallly like the ingredients in all the products in this line, and recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pugwump

customer_reviews.title: Now a forever user
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely lovely gel moisturizer. I got this as a trial in my Allure beauty box. It’s NOT STICKY! It’s light and gently scented. Saved my windburned face within 2 days! Forever a user of this moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Hunt

customer_reviews.title: The best moisturizer I’ve ever used!! But too pricey! $$$$
customer_reviews.text: I love love LOVE this moisturizer!! I wish I could give it the stars it deserves because it is that wonderful! It’s so lightweight. I have oily skin and it seems to keep the oil production under control. But, it’s SO pricey! It’s worth the price if you have about $40 to spend on a moisturizer. I would absolutely give this cream a 5 star review if it wasn’t for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jprzadka

customer_reviews.title: Loving this cream
customer_reviews.text: I am so loving this moisturizer cream. It leaves my face feeling and looking so nice. It has no scent which I love, definitely moisturizes.
customer_reviews.author: marmar

customer_reviews.title: A sample of the product has sold me...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a sample item from Ulta in a goodie bag when I spent XX amount of money there a few months ago. I used it AND loved it. I love the smell of it! It doesn’t feel heavy or greasy but a light feeling On my face. A sample has got me hooked, way to go on marketing your product belif... I’m sold...
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Prem

customer_reviews.title: Not for my oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. It just sits in my face a d it feels itchy. Very oily too.
customer_reviews.author: kay

product_meta.title: | belif The True Cream Aqua Bomb | Moisturizer for Combination to Oily Skin | Face Cream, Hydration, Clean Beauty
product_meta.description:
This formula contains a blend of apothecary herbs, including antioxidant-rich lady's mantle which helps neutralize skin-damaging free radicals, improves skin elasticity, and minimizes the appearances of pores. The refreshing cream is formulated to burst when applied, releasing a flood of weightless moisture onto skin for a healthy, smooth, supple appearance. Apply as needed to face and neck.Can be used morning and night. For a midday moisture boost, tap gently onto skin.Can be used as a makeup primer to hydrate and prep the skin before applying makeup. Leave on overnight for an ultra-hydrating sleeping mask. Combine with liquid/loose powder highlighter for a dewy glow. Mix with a high-coverage foundation for a tinted moisturizer. Add a couple of drops of serum or an oil for extra nourishment. Store in the refrigerator a super-cooling sensation upon application.

BRAND STORY
The undisputed authority in hydration. belif combines time-trusted apothecary herbs and modern skin science to create effective skincare solutions
